name: Verum Visum
description:
Verum Visum specializes in virtual and augmented reality applications development.
Our company was founded in 2010 and our R&D office is located in the biggest IT park in Kyiv, Ukraine. Nowadays we cover the market of Europe and the United States.
Products: AR/VR training simulators, video360 players, broadcasting/streaming applications, products configurators, and VR cinema.
Our team includes all the necessary specialists: developers (Unity, Unreal Engine, Android, iOS,  Xamarin, PHP, etc.), designers, 3D modelers and animators, project managers, game designers, testers and other experts.
We opened research laboratory, which is equipped with the latest AR/VR hardware/software, and launched education courses for AR/VR specialists in order to attract best talents to join our team.
